dcterms:description: The Kinetics dataset consists of short clips (typically 10 sec long) sampled from YouTube and labeled using 400 classes. The version used in this paper consists of approximately 261k clips.
dcterms:title: Kinetics-400

dcterms:description: The Kinetics dataset consists of short clips (typically 10 sec long) sampled from YouTube and labeled using 600 classes. The version used in this paper consists of approximately 457k clips.
dcterms:title: Kinetics-600

dcterms:description: The SSv2 dataset consists of 220,487 short videos, with a length between 2 and 6 seconds that picture humans performing pre-defined basic actions with everyday objects.
dcterms:title: Something-Something-v2 (SSv2)

dcterms:description: Epic-100 is an egocentric large scale action recognition dataset consisting of more than 90,000 action segments that span across 100 hours of recordings in native environments, capturing daily activities.
dcterms:title: Epic Kitchens-100 (Epic-100)
